subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr made a 15-foot birdie putt on the first playoff hole to defeat Helen Alfredsson and Sophie Gustafson in the Safeway Classic at Columbia Edgewater Country Club in Portland, Ore. Alfredsson and Gustafson missed longer birdie putts during the playoff before Kerr made hers.
